message.raw:
Modified data acquisition on ni_pcie_6363. We now append data to an array at the end of the experiment (due to performance issues).

Unfortunately with 32 channels @ 20kHz for 60s results in a 3 minute wait while the array is formed at the end of the experiment.

We're working to resolve this ASAP!
